required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Biomarker Study Accompanying the AIO-TRK-0114 Study (MARBLE)
clinical_study.official_title: Biomarker Study Accompanying the AIO-TRK-0114 Study (MARBLE)

brief_summary.textblock: To compare the efficacy of afatinib maintenance with pemetrexed maintenance following induction therapy with platinum/ pemetrexed in patients with metastatic EGFR mutated non-small-cell lung cancer progressing after first-line treatment with afatinib as first tyrosine kinase inhibitor with respect to progression-free survival

detailed_description.textblock: Patients who have progressed after first-line treatment with afatinib as first tyrosine kinase inhibitor (TKI) will be screened while they are receiving second-line (induction) treatment consisting of cisplatin / carboplatin plus pemetrexed given in 21-day cycles. Patients who do not progress (i.e. complete or partial response, or stable disease - CR, PR or SD) after completion of at least three and not more than four chemotherapy cycles will be randomized (1:1 ratio) to receive maintenance therapy with either afatinib (40 mg/d or last tolerated dose during first-line treatment with afatinib as first TKI) or pemetrexed (500 mg/m2 or 375 mg/m2 if dose reduction was required every 21 days) until disease progression or treatment discontinuation because of patient decision or toxicity.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: A randomized, open-label, phase II study

primary_outcome.measure: Progression-free Survival in relation to exploratory biomarkers

secondary_outcome.measure: Overall Survival in relation to exploratory biomarkers

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Assessed every 6 weeks for 24 weeks, then every 9 weeks
secondary_outcome.description: Objective response rate, clinical benefit rate (RECIST 1.1)

clinical_study.condition: Non-small-cell Lung Cancer With Somatic EGFR Mutations

arm_group.description: Afatinib 40 mg/d (30, or 20 mg/d in case of dose reduction during 1st line treatment)
Pemetrexed 500 mg/m2 (375 mg/m² in case of dose reduction during induction therapy) i.v. on d1 of each 21-day cycle

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Participation in the AIO-TRK-0114 (MARBLE) study (EudraCT-No. 2014-001983-36)
2. Written informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Patients who do not meet the inclusion criterial of the AIO-TRK-0114 (MARBLE) study (EudraCT-No. 2014-001983-36)
